title: Introducing RAVE Aerospace: A New Name, Built on a Legacy of In-Flight Innovation
summary: LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)--For nearly two decades, RAVE has been a trusted name in in-flight entertainment and connectivity for customers around the world. Today, that heritage continues under a new company name: RAVE Aerospace.
